title: Gloom
desc:
- Playable off of <:gloom:1187518684143550605>, <:black:1106265022453268530>, <:lightblue:1120572625865949194>, and <:blue:1106234079055200378>.
- Any <:gloom:1187518684143550605> card must inflict the Gloom status effect, and/or add the <:gloom:1187518684143550605> color to another card, in some way, shape, or form.
- If a <:gloom:1187518684143550605> card doesn't do either in any condition, **Gloom** is automatically applied to whichever player(s) the card directly affects.
